underlying_goal: To initialize a git repository for the PDF comment extractor project.
primary_success: Claude correctly initialized the git repository and made an initial commit including all relevant project files, while also noting the successful run of a pre-commit security hook (gitleaks).
brief_summary: The user requested to initialize a git repository and create an initial commit for the project. Claude successfully executed this, committing 7 project files and noting that a pre-commit hook for secret scanning ran automatically.
